snippet: Thomas P. DiNapoli issued a report saying governments across New York State were collecting less in taxes, burning through cash reserves and running up deficits.
abstract: New York State Comptroller Thomas P DiNapoli issues a report saying local governments across the state are collecting less in taxes, burning through their cash reserves and running up deficits; report casts long-term doubt on the financial health of many municipalities.
lead_paragraph: Thomas P. DiNapoli issued a report saying governments across New York State were collecting less in taxes, burning through cash reserves and running up deficits.

headline.seo: N.Y. State Comptroller Warns of Perilous Local Finances
headline.main: Local Governments Face Fiscal Peril, State Comptroller Warns
headline.print_headline: Local Finances in Peril, State Comptroller Warns
